channel.title: Walking glitch
channel.description:
hey mopars,
I goth a glitch in my server,
when you talk with a npc end then walk away it keep facing to the npc when you talk with another npc it keep facing his direction
i deleted the thing that update your facing but i cant find what in my old client
any ideas ?

item.title: Walking glitch
item.dc:creator: @supra_s supra s
item.description:
@supra_s wrote:

[quote=“skiller noob1, post:2, topic:178703”]Maybe you should move the NPC’s.[/quote]maybe you should read my thread good end dont thionk only on your post count end hoping to become a mod …

WHEN I TALK WITH NPC … Then Walk away from npc AFTER Dialogue … IT KEEEEEEP FACING the direction where the npc is located

Read full topic

item.title: Walking glitch
item.dc:creator: @skiller_noob1 skiller noob1
item.description:
@skiller_noob1 wrote:

Maybe you should move the NPC’s.

Read full topic
